text:
Peter Masiko, Jr., President
MIAMI-DADE JUNIOR COLLEGE
11380 N.W. 27th AVENUE • MIAMI, FLORIDA 33167 • PHONE 688-3541
February 26, 1965
Mr. Harold Hill
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
Dupont Circle Building
Washington, D. C.
Dear Harold:
I'm sorry to bother you with this, but I have not received any
NAEB since I came down here as Director of Broadcasting and I don't
know what the devil is going on regarding the meeting that is scheduled
to be held in Williamsburg just prior to the NAB meeting in Washington,
March 21 through 24.
Could you please drop me a line as to particulars about this
meeting? I'd like to request travel funds to attend it if it is
something in which our institution may be interested, going on from
there to the NAB in Washington.
Did Sandy go into hostess school?
JC:bgs
